summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3004, for the improvement of Rainier Avenue from Thistle Street to a point 180 feet south of Barton Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 36183 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
